Name: Ben McCormick
AboutMe:
I'm a Front End focused Software Engineer, currently employed by Windsor Circle in North Carolina.

I primarily work in Javascript and have experience with a variety of the frameworks and libraries in the JS ecosystem, including

  • BackboneJS
  • jQuery
  • KnockoutJS
  • Coffeescript
  • MarionetteJS

I also have plenty of experience doing serverside work in Java and Python, though my experience there lacks the depth of my front-end knowledge.

I also like geeking out about tools and am very familiar with:

  • Vim
  • Sublime Text
  • GruntJS
  • Git
  • Tmux
  • JSHint

When I'm not wrapped up in code I love playing basketball and board games. I'm a follower of Christ. Currently living with my wife Claire in Durham NC.
